value.title: StarCraft 2: REYNOR PLAYING PROTOSS?! (Bly vs Reynor)
value.excerpt: Since there are not a lot of big offline tournaments on the horizon, a few SC2 pro gamers have decided to rank up their offraces over the last week or two in StarCraft 2. In the case of Reynor, one of the best Zerg players in the world, he has been playing a significant amount of Protoss and also Terran.

value.title: StarCraft 2: Reynor's 100 PROBE Economy! (Skillous vs Reynor)
value.excerpt: Professional game of StarCraft 2 between Reynor (Protoss) and Skillous (Protoss). In this long game of PvP we watch two pro players play a wildly different style. Skillous tries to max out with Carriers, Archons and a Mothership, whereas Reynor puts a heavy focus on Zealots, Stalkers and Dark Templar.

value.title: StarCraft 2: Serral MASSES ULTRALISKS vs Zest?! (Zerg vs Protoss)
value.excerpt: Professional match of StarCraft 2 between Serral and Zest. In this match Zest opens up with what looks like a standard turtle Sky Toss style. However, as he transitions towards a lot of Gateways, Serral is forced to respond and decides to go for Ultralisks. Ultras versus Protoss are incredibly uncommon.
